meta.description: Type foundry database for typography inspiration site

foundries.name: Klim Type Foundry
foundries.notes: Known for deeply researched essays on type design process

foundries.name: Dinamo
foundries.notes: Pushing variable font technology, experimental approach

foundries.name: Commercial Type
foundries.notes: Major editorial clients including Guardian, Vanity Fair

foundries.name: OH no Type Co
foundries.notes: Distinctive voice, great blog writing, Vulfpeck collaboration

foundries.name: Production Type
foundries.notes: Strong editorial focus, French design tradition

foundries.name: MCKL Type
foundries.notes: American vernacular influences, strong display faces

foundries.name: Pangram Pangram Foundry
foundries.notes: Accessible pricing, popular with young designers

foundries.name: Atipo Foundry
foundries.notes: Spanish foundry with clean geometric aesthetics

foundries.name: Bold Monday
foundries.founder: Paul van der Laan, Pieter van Rosmalen

foundries.name: TypeMates
foundries.founder: Lisa Fischbach, Jakob Runge, Nils Thomsen

foundries.name: Vocal Type Co
foundries.notes: Civil rights history focus, each font tells a story

foundries.name: Arrow Type
foundries.notes: Variable font pioneer, Recursive is landmark

foundries.name: DJR
foundries.notes: Font of the Month Club, variable font pioneer

foundries.name: Mark Simonson Studio
foundries.notes: Proxima Nova is one of most-used web fonts

foundries.name: Hoefler&Co
foundries.notes: Gotham used in Obama campaign, major editorial work

foundries.name: Lineto
foundries.notes: Circular used by Spotify, Airbnb. Elite Swiss

foundries.name: Emigre
foundries.notes: Legendary magazine and foundry, defined 90s typography
